General.Name: Remitly Global Inc
General.Description: Remitly Global, Inc. provides digital financial services for immigrants and their families. It primarily offers cross-border remittance services in approximately 170 countries. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Seattle, Washington.
General.Address: 111 Third Avenue, Seattle, WA, United States, 98101
